title: Attack on St. Augustine
description: St. Augustine, Florida, is the oldest town in the United States founded by Europeans. Attack on St. Augustine introduces students to the history of this town through the eyes of Isabel and her family as they flee for their lives. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships as well as identify and use adjectives.
